# bunkerweb_global_config_setting (Resource)

Manages a single key within the BunkerWeb global configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "bunkerweb" {
  api_endpoint = "https://127.0.0.1:8888"
  # Bearer token Auth
  api_token = var.api_token # If you choose to use Bearer Token configured in your API deployment
  # OR Basic Auth
  api_username = var.api_username # Basic Auth configured in your API deployment.
  api_password = var.api_password # required with api_username to work.
}

resource "bunkerweb_global_config_setting" "retry" {
  key   = "retry_limit"
  value = "10"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) Name of the global configuration setting to manage.

### Optional

- `value` (String) Scalar value as a string. Booleans and numbers are parsed automatically.
- `value_json` (String) Raw JSON payload for complex values. Use `jsonencode(...)` to build this string.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Internal identifier that matches the configuration key.
